full_summary:
## Phase 1 - Invitation to Qualify for Construction of New Pesticide Building

### Notice Details

*   **Reference Number:** WS4619244436-Doc4619378390
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4619244436
*   **Publication Date:** June 6, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date & Time:** June 28, 2024, 14:00 EDT
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** September 20, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** February 26, 2026
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Work Description

This is the first phase of a two-phase project for the construction of a new pesticide building at the Agricultural and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Scott site in Saskatchewan. The work involves the construction of approximately 289 m2 gross floor area building. The scope of work includes:

*   New concrete slab and foundations
*   Steel frame structures
*   Roof construction
*   Associated mechanical and electrical systems
*   Site work

### Evaluation Criteria

The qualification of interested suppliers will be evaluated based on their experience, capabilities, and financial resources. Suppliers who demonstrate the required qualifications will be invited to proceed to the next phase where they will provide a detailed financial bid on the project.

### Important Information

Please note that all bids must be submitted by June 28, 2024, 14:00 EDT. Bids submitted after this deadline will be declared non-responsive.

### Additional Resources

For more information, please visit the Ariba Discovery website at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19940200?extsite=MTk5NDAyMDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19940200?extsite=MTk5NDAyMDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
